trans-unit.source: Specifies the properties that are in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Specifica le proprietà presenti in un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> specifies which properties are associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> specifica le proprietà che sono associate un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.

trans-unit.source: For each property in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> contains a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> object which specifies constraints such as the minimum and maximum values of the property.
trans-unit.target: Per ogni proprietà in un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> contiene un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> oggetto che specifica i vincoli, ad esempio i valori minimo e massimi della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.HasProperty%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetPropertyInfo%2A> methods to check for these properties in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.HasProperty%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetPropertyInfo%2A> metodi per verificare la presenza di queste proprietà nel <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> must share the same <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
trans-unit.target: Tutti <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> gli oggetti in un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> devono condividere lo stesso <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.

trans-unit.source: If you try to add a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> that has a different <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se si tenta di aggiungere un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> per un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> che dispone di un altro <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>, verrà generata un'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: The following example gets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> for a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> and gets the information for each <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene ottenuto il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> per un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> e ottiene le informazioni per ogni <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> nel <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> that contains information for the properties <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore predefinito crea un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> che contiene informazioni per le proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y>, e <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> object and uses it to create a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene creato un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> dell'oggetto e viene utilizzato per creare un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.

trans-unit.source: A generic IEnumerable of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo" /> that specifies the properties in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Un generico IEnumerable di tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo" /> che specifica le proprietà in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> con gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo" /> specificati.

trans-unit.source: You must pass in <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> objects for the properties, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>.
trans-unit.target: È necessario passare <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> oggetti per le proprietà, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y>, e <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> object and uses it to create a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene creato un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> dell'oggetto e viene utilizzato per creare un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> to check.
trans-unit.target: Primo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> da verificare.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> to check.
trans-unit.target: Secondo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> da verificare.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> objects are identical.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> sono identici.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> objects are identical; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> sono identici; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> objects are compatible if they contain the same <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> objects in the same order.
trans-unit.target: Due <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> oggetti compatibili se contengono lo stesso <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> oggetti nello stesso ordine.

trans-unit.source: The following example checks whether two <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> objects are compatible.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio seguente verifica se due <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> oggetti sono compatibili.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> to intersect.
trans-unit.target: Primo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> da intersecare.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> to intersect.
trans-unit.target: Secondo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> da intersecare.

trans-unit.source: Returns the intersection of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'intersezione degli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> specificati.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> that contains the properties that are present if both of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> che contiene le proprietà presenti in entrambi gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> specificati.

trans-unit.source: `StylusPointDescription1` and `stylusPointDescriptionPreserveInfo` may have a common property, yet the constraints specified in their respective <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> objects differ.
trans-unit.target: `StylusPointDescription1` e `stylusPointDescriptionPreserveInfo` potrebbe essere una proprietà comune, ma i vincoli specificati nelle rispettive <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> oggetti diversi.

trans-unit.source: If the constraints differ, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> from `stylusPointDescriptionPreserveInfo`.
trans-unit.target: Se i vincoli sono diversi, il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A> metodo utilizza il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> da `stylusPointDescriptionPreserveInfo`.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to find the common <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> from two different <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> objects.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio riportato di seguito viene illustrato come trovare l'oggetto comune <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> da due diversi <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> that specifies the property of the desired <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> che specifica la proprietà dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo" /> desiderato.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo" /> for the specified property.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo" /> per la proprietà specificata.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to get the information about a property from a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come ottenere le informazioni relative a una proprietà da un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusMove> event has been connected to the event handler below.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio si presuppone che il <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusMove> evento è stato connesso al gestore dell'evento riportato di seguito.

trans-unit.source: Gets all the properties of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene tutte le proprietà dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains all of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Insieme che contiene tutti gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo" /> nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example gets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> for a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> together with the information for each <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene ottenuto il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> per un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> con le informazioni per ogni <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> nel <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> to check for in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> da verificare nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> has the specified property.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> corrente ha la proprietà specificata.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> has the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> ha la proprietà <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> specificato; in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to get the information about a property from a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come ottenere le informazioni relative a una proprietà da un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusMove> event has been connected to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio si presuppone che il <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusMove> evento è stato connesso al gestore dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> against which to check whether the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> is a subset.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> rispetto al quale controllare se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> corrente è un sottoinsieme.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> is a subset of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> corrente è un sottoinsieme dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> is a subset of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore è <see langword="true" /> se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> corrente è un sottoinsieme dell'autorizzazione <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> specificata; in caso contrario è <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example checks whether `description2` is a subset of `description1`.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene controllato se `description2` è un subset di `description1`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of properties in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero di proprietà in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: The number of properties in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Numero di proprietà in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to get the properties of each <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come ottenere le proprietà di ogni <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> in un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes there is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> called `packetOutput`.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio si presuppone che non esiste un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> chiamato `packetOutput`.
